scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:react && npm run install:functions
scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch "**/*" --ignore "build/**" --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css --exec "npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/server/app.js"
scripts.prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/server/app.js
